00001 #include "WorldNode.h"
00002 #include "../GRender.h"
00003 #include <math.h>
00004 #include "./3DRenderLayer.h"

00006 const unsigned int phi_stride = 10;
00007 const unsigned int theta_stride = 10;
00008 
00009 inline float getXPoint(float phi, float theta, float radius)
00010 {
00011     return radius * sin ( phi * (M_PI / 180.0f) ) * cosf ( theta * (M_PI / 180.0f));
00012 }
00013 
00014 inline float getYPoint(float phi, float theta, float radius)
00015 {
00016     return radius * sin ( phi * (M_PI / 180.0f) ) * sinf ( theta * (M_PI / 180.0f));
00017 }
00018 
00019 inline float getZPoint(float phi, float theta, float radius)
00020 {
00021     return radius * cos ( phi * (M_PI / 180.0f));
00022 }
00023 
00024 inline float getUPoint(float phi, float theta, float r)
00025 {
00026     return sin(theta * (M_PI / 180.0f)) * cos(phi * (M_PI / 180.0f));
00027 }
00028 
00029 inline float getVPoint(float phi, float theta, float r)
00030 {
00031     return sin(theta * (M_PI / 180.0f)) * sin(phi * (M_PI / 180.0f));
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00035 inline unsigned int addToVertices(float phi, float theta, float r, float* Vertices, unsigned int currentVPtr)
00036 {
00037 
00038     Vertices[currentVPtr] = getXPoint(phi, theta, r);
00039     currentVPtr++;
00040 
00041     Vertices[currentVPtr] = getYPoint(phi, theta, r);
00042     currentVPtr++;
00043 
00044     Vertices[currentVPtr] = getZPoint(phi, theta, r);
00045     currentVPtr++;
00046 
00047     return currentVPtr;
00048 }
00049 
00050 inline unsigned int addToUV(float phi, float theta, float r, float* uvPtr, unsigned int currentUVP)
00051 {
00052 
00053     //float x = getXPoint(phi, theta, r);
00054     float y = getYPoint(phi, theta, r);
00055     //float z = getZPoint(phi, theta, r);
00056 
00057     float uComponent = phi / 360.0f;
00058 //    float vComponent = theta / 180.0f;
00059 
00060     uvPtr[currentUVP] = uComponent;
00061     currentUVP++;
00062 
00063     uvPtr[currentUVP] = 1 - (y / r);
00064     currentUVP++;
00065 
00066     return currentUVP;
00067 }

00069 WorldNode::WorldNode(const char* Viewfile, float radius)
00070 {
00071 
00072     printf("Created Skydome\n");
00073 
00074     m_skydomeVSet = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->newVertexSet();
00075 
00076     m_radius = radius;
00077 
00078     m_panoramicDomeTexture = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getTextureMonitor()->getTexture(Viewfile);
00079 
00080     f_calculateVertices();
00081 }
00082 
00083 WorldNode::~WorldNode()
00084 {
00085     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getTextureMonitor()->releaseTexture(m_panoramicDomeTexture);
00086     delete m_skydomeVSet;
00087     printf("Destroyed Skydome\n");
00088 }
00089 
00090 void WorldNode::f_calculateVertices()
00091 {
00092     float* m_skydomeVertices, *m_skydomeUV;
00093 
00094     m_skydomeVertices = new float[ (180 / theta_stride) * (180 / phi_stride) * 4 * 3];
00095     m_skydomeUV = new float[ (180 / theta_stride) * (180 / phi_stride) * 4 * 2];
00096 
00097     unsigned int vPtr = 0;
00098     unsigned int uvPtr = 0;
00099 
00100     for (unsigned int phi = 0; phi <= 180 - theta_stride; phi += phi_stride)
00101     {
00102 
00103             for (unsigned int theta = 0; theta <= 180 - theta_stride; theta += theta_stride)
00104             {
00105                 vPtr = addToVertices(phi, theta, m_radius, m_skydomeVertices, vPtr);
00106                 uvPtr = addToUV(phi, theta, m_radius, m_skydomeUV, uvPtr);
00107 
00108                 vPtr = addToVertices(phi + phi_stride, theta, m_radius, m_skydomeVertices, vPtr);
00109                 uvPtr = addToUV(phi + phi_stride, theta, m_radius, m_skydomeUV, uvPtr);
00110 
00111                 vPtr = addToVertices(phi + phi_stride, theta + theta_stride, m_radius, m_skydomeVertices, vPtr);
00112                 uvPtr = addToUV(phi + phi_stride, theta + theta_stride, m_radius, m_skydomeUV, uvPtr);
00113 
00114                 vPtr = addToVertices(phi, theta + theta_stride, m_radius, m_skydomeVertices, vPtr);
00115                 uvPtr = addToUV(phi, theta + theta_stride, m_radius, m_skydomeUV, uvPtr);
00116             }
00117     }
00118 
00119 
00120     m_skydomeVSet->setVertices( m_skydomeVertices, (180 / theta_stride) * (180 / phi_stride) * 4);
00121     m_skydomeVSet->setTextureCoordinates( m_skydomeUV, (180 / theta_stride) * (180 / phi_stride) * 4);
00122 
00123     delete[] m_skydomeVertices;
00124     delete[] m_skydomeUV;
00125 
00126 }

00133 void WorldNode::draw(Camera* activeCam)
00134 {
00135     float* rMatrix = 0;
00136     float* pMatrix = 0;
00137 
00138     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->pushMatrix();
00139 
00140         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->resetMatrix();
00141 
00142         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->setDepthTesting(false);
00143 
00144 
00145         rMatrix = activeCam->getRotation().getMatrix();
00146 
00147         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->rotateMatrix(rMatrix[0], rMatrix[1], rMatrix[2]);
00148 
00149         if (m_panoramicDomeTexture != 0)
00150             m_panoramicDomeTexture->makeActive();
00151 
00152         m_skydomeVSet->Draw(0, (180 / theta_stride) * (180 / phi_stride) * 4, QUADS);
00153 
00154         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->setDepthTesting(true);
00155 
00156 
00157     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->popMatrix();
00158 
00159     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->pushMatrix();
00160 
00161         rMatrix = activeCam->getRotation().getMatrix();
00162 
00163         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->rotateMatrix(rMatrix[0], rMatrix[1], rMatrix[2]);
00164 
00165         pMatrix = activeCam->getPosition().getMatrix();
00166 
00167         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->translateMatrix(pMatrix[0], pMatrix[1], pMatrix[2]);
00168 
00169         SceneNode::draw(activeCam);
00170 
00171     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->popMatrix();
00172 }
